---
title: "Repeated measures corr (ET12)"
format:
  html:
    toc: true
---

Extended Data Table 12 is the output of the [repeated measures correlation analysis](helper-rmcorr.qmd), filtering self-correlations and any p values > 0.01.

```{r}
library(here)
here::i_am('et12.qmd')
load("out/rmcorr_full.Rdata")

corr <- corr |> dplyr::arrange(padj_v2) |> 
  dplyr::filter(padj_v2 < 0.05)
writexl::write_xlsx(corr, path = here("out/Extended-Data-Table-12.xlsx"))
```

```{r}
DT::datatable(corr)

```
